title: (x) Elkhart County Fair - Stymie {Dan}
content:
I thought this was stymie but the "y" is throwing me off. Does anyone know what this is??? Thank you for the help. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194037im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21398.jpg)

 [‹ Funkapolitan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2236 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Wutangcorp.com - Zero Twos {Grant} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080623194037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2234 "Go to next forum topic")
author: julia

comments.content: Julia, it probably is Stymie they had to convert it to outlines to make the medal for the o so how hard would it be to change the y, five minutes maybe.

six minutes for me...   
blindfolded, handcuffed and with a windowsmachine with no mouse   
i also think it is Stymie
The 't' matches Bitstream's Stymie, but the 'y' (horizontally flipped) matches URW's. But this is Stymie, alright.
